tasks.name: Fix Light Mode Theme Variables and Color Contrast
tasks.description: Update CSS custom properties in globals.css to improve light mode readability and ensure WCAG 2.1 AA color contrast compliance. This includes adjusting background, foreground, muted, border, and popover color values for better visual hierarchy and accessibility.
tasks.notes: Critical foundation task that affects all subsequent UI improvements. Must maintain backward compatibility with existing dark and high-contrast themes.

relatedFiles.description: Main CSS file containing theme color variables

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Update :root CSS variables in src/app/globals.css:
   - Improve --muted and --muted-foreground contrast ratios
   - Enhance --border and --input visibility
   - Fix --popover and --popover-foreground contrast
   - Ensure minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text
2. Test color combinations using contrast checking tools
3. Verify changes don't break dark mode or high-contrast themes
tasks.verificationCriteria:
1. All text meets WCAG 2.1 AA contrast requirements (4.5:1 minimum)
2. Light mode components are clearly readable
3. Dark and high-contrast modes remain unchanged
4. Visual testing across major browsers
tasks.analysisResult: Comprehensive UI/UX and accessibility improvements for StudySpark application focusing on light mode styling, WCAG compliance, text visibility in dialogs, and Stu mascot sizing. Solution maintains existing architecture while enhancing user experience across all themes and viewport sizes.
tasks.summary: Successfully updated CSS custom properties in globals.css to improve light mode readability and ensure WCAG 2.1 AA compliance. Key improvements include: 1) Enhanced foreground contrast from 10% to 9% gray for better readability, 2) Changed background to pure white for maximum contrast, 3) Improved popover foreground contrast for dialog text visibility, 4) Enhanced primary green color with better contrast ratio, 5) Updated muted colors with light blue-gray theme for better visual hierarchy, 6) Improved border and input visibility, 7) Added proper focus-visible states for accessibility, 8) Enhanced checkbox focus styling for high-contrast mode. All changes maintain backward compatibility with dark and high-contrast themes while achieving minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratios for WCAG AA compliance.

tasks.name: Enhance KoalaMascot Component with Responsive Sizing
tasks.description: Improve the KoalaMascot component to support multiple size variants and optimize appearance in circular containers. Add responsive sizing system that works well across different contexts including the tasks and reminders tabs.
tasks.notes: Component enhancement must maintain backward compatibility. Default behavior should remain unchanged for existing implementations.

relatedFiles.description: Main KoalaMascot component requiring size variants
Update KoalaMascot usage with appropriate size

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Add size prop to KoalaMascot interface with variants: 'xs', 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl'
2. Implement size mapping using cva (Class Variance Authority):
   - xs: w-8 h-8 (for small icons)
   - sm: w-12 h-12 (for circular containers)
   - md: w-16 h-16 (current default)
   - lg: w-24 h-24 (for prominent display)
   - xl: w-32 h-32 (for hero sections)
3. Update consuming components to use appropriate sizes
4. Ensure SVG scales properly in circular containers
tasks.verificationCriteria:
1. KoalaMascot renders correctly at all size variants
2. Stu appears appropriately sized in circular containers
3. No breaking changes to existing implementations
4. SVG maintains crisp appearance at all sizes
tasks.analysisResult: Comprehensive UI/UX and accessibility improvements for StudySpark application focusing on light mode styling, WCAG compliance, text visibility in dialogs, and Stu mascot sizing. Solution maintains existing architecture while enhancing user experience across all themes and viewport sizes.
tasks.summary: Successfully enhanced the KoalaMascot component with responsive sizing system using CVA (Class Variance Authority). Added size prop with xs, sm, md, lg, xl variants and updated all consuming components to use appropriate sizes. Key improvements: 1) Added koalaMascotVariants with 5 size options (xs: 8×8px, sm: 12×12px, md: 16×16px default, lg: 24×24px, xl: 32×32px), 2) Updated RemindersTab to use 'lg' size for better circular container display, 3) Updated StuTaskGuidance to use dynamic sizing and 'xs' for quick guidance, 4) Updated draggable-widget to use 'sm' for compact displays, 5) Updated WidgetContent to use 'lg' for prominent mascot display, 6) Updated StuPreferences to use 'md' for preview, 7) Updated GamifiedReminderTab to use 'xl' for hero display. All changes maintain backward compatibility and TypeScript builds successfully.
